title: Affaire Royale
description: Honeysuckle: Sweetness of DispositionEvery inch a princess, Gabriella had been found crumpled and unconscious on the side of the road. Now she was supposedly safe, with her royal family she didn't remember... and a darkly handsome detective she'd never forget. Reeve MacGee had given her memories to treasure, but would he provide her with a brokenhearted future?
author: Nora Roberts
